pageTitle: Does your Statutory Sick Pay end in the next 3 months?

statutoryEnd.label: Does your Statutory Sick Pay end in the next 3 months?
statutoryEnd.hint:
You can find this date on your SSP1 form.

If you do not have an SSP1 form, you can get this information from your employer.

error: Select yes if your Statutory Sick Pay ends in the next 3 months
